# mruby-json

[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/mattn/mruby-json.svg)](https://travis-ci.org/mattn/mruby-json)

JSON parser for mruby

## install by mrbgems
```ruby
MRuby::Build.new do |conf|

    # ... (snip) ...

    conf.gem :github => 'mattn/mruby-json'
end
```
